hadiths.text: Hammam b. Munabbih reported:This is what Abu Huraira transmitted to us from Muhammad, the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ), and he mentioned a number of a hadith, of which this is one: that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: When anyone amongst you (performs ablution) he must snuff his nostrils with water and then clean them

chapter.eng-name: Odd numbers when rinsing the nose and cleaning oneself with pebbles (istijmar)
